name: All Contact Lost
description: All Contact Lost is a Sci-Fi survival FPS where you are put in charge of building an outpost on the moon, backed by a team of four, you must build powerful defences, strategise your team and fight to endure the horror below the surface known as the Acari.
minimum_requirements: OS: Windows 7 Processor: i5-2500 Graphics: GTX 660 DirectX: Version 10 Storage: 6 GB available space Sound Card: Nvidia high definition audio
